title: Arrowsight's Aronson: Remote Video Auditing for Health (Audio)
itunes:title: Arrowsight's Aronson: Remote Video Auditing for Health (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: SMALL BUSINESS: Adam Aronson, CEO of Arrowsight, on optimizing worker productivity using third-party video surveillance or remote video auditing (RVA) technology- one of the fastest growing areas of security.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
